meanings.definition: A fibrous joint in which two bones are bound by strong connective tissue.
meanings.sent1: The syndesmoses between the bones provide stability and support.
meanings.sent2: Doctors examined the syndesmoses to determine the extent of the injury.
meanings.sent3: The syndesmoses decided to hold hands and never let go.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like syndesmoses, unbreakable and resilient.
meanings.sent5: The image of the syndesmoses holding the bones together stayed in his mind.
